instruction: Come up with a set of rules for a game.
output:
1. Respect the game and all participants.
2. Follow the instructions and rules of the game.
3. Take turns speaking and listening to each other.
4. Remain polite and courteous to other players.
5. Limit distractions while playing.
6. Practice fair play and sportsmanship.
7. Refrain from using offensive language or behavior.
8. Do not cheat or use unfair strategies.
9. Do not interfere with other players.
10. Keep the game fun and respectful to all participants.
